round_best: Develop a generative model framework that incorporates a synthesizability predictor module within its architecture. This predictor would use machine learning to assess the chemical synthesis complexity of generated molecules in real-time, providing feedback to the generative model to steer molecule design towards compounds that are not only potentially efficacious but also easily synthesizable. This integrated approach ensures that the output of the generative model is more aligned with pragmatic drug development needs, potentially accelerating the transition from discovery to manufacturing.
